Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet high standards. It comes with a range of features designed to enhance your experience and efficiency. Given its quality and functionality, I believe it's worth more than its face value of $120. Considering this, I'm offering you the opportunity to own it for $150. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the value we place on customer satisfaction. I trust you'll find the product invaluable. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
